text: 'What a frightful event! he wrote. 'I tremble! What infatuation! Personally I am. indifferent, but I really tremble for my country! I may be mistaken, tho' I cannot but fear that the exasperation of the People will be so great at the return of Ultratoryism that the Commons House upon a dissolution, which must be had, will be a mass of Radicalism, & then God knows what may happen.. thation! Porsonally I am indiffewent, but I really tremble. For my lountry!I may he mistaktn, stho'I cannot but. Fear that tht exasyvation of the Peoplt wil bt so qreat as the return of Ultratoryism, that tht lommons House upon a dissolution, which must bt hady wil be a mass of Radicalism & thtn aod knows what uddoy Aow Tizigna Botrugno Name:'
name: Tizigna Botrugno
